Name: select_user_story
Description: Whether a user story is selected for the sprint

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Whether a worker is assigned to a task

Name: choose_feature_for_release
Description: Whether a feature is included in the next release

Name: allocate_budget_to_project
Description: Budget allocated to a project this cycle

Name: set_team_size
Description: Number of team members to staff the sprint

Name: set_max_tasks_per_worker
Description: Cap of tasks assigned per worker

Name: assign_scrum_master_to_team
Description: Whether a Scrum Master is assigned to a team

Name: allow_overtime
Description: Allowance flag for overtime in exceptional cases

Name: set_review_attendees_target
Description: Target number of Sprint Review attendees

Name: prioritize_epic_level
Description: Priority bucket assigned to an epic
